tool.name: Create lookup table with spectra
tool.description: for correlating quant and ID data
tool.command:
#for $displayname in $spectra.keys() ln -s '$spectra[$displayname]' '$displayname' && #end for python $__tool_directory__/msslookup_spectra.py --infiles #for $displayname in $spectra.keys() '$displayname' #end for --setpatterns #for $pool in $pools '${pool.set_identifier}' #end for --setnames #for $pool in $pools '${pool.set_name}' #end for
&& mv mslookup_db.sqlite '$output'

param.name: set_identifier
param.label: Filename part identifying biological set
param.help: Specify part of the input spectra filenames that are unique for each set, e.g set_A.

tool.help: Store some information about the MS2 spectra in an SQLite database. Will later be used to reference identifications to spectra and output e.g. scan number, retention time which MSGF+ does not use.
